text: Sara Gilbert. Nearly a week after ABC canceled Roseanne following the star ’ s racist tweet, co - star Sara Gilbert spoke on her other show, The Talk, about the sitcom ’ s end. Gilbert was an executive producer on the revival and one of the driving forces to get it to happen. She was one of the first to speak out on Twitter against Barr ’ s tweet last Tuesday, before ABC canceled the series. “ In addition to my statement, I would like to say this has been a very difficult week, ” Gilbert said. “ A lot of people have been hurt by this.
